website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced home security system with perks many want, such as burglar sensor and remote control.
pros: Fast-response system is easy to use and requires no contract
Cellular connection grants speedy connection via text
Plus plan includes smartphone and voice control
cons: Some owners say the app has a fairly steep learning curve

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install equipment but needed help with passcode and App. No weekend tech support. I was not comfortable with that. App was ridiculous! Returning!
customer_reviews.author: A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Love having my home be secure!
customer_reviews.text: Easy step by step installation! Had no problems with getting my home safe and secure. My husband works out of town 4 weeks at a time, so I love having the protection I need as a woman with 4 kids at home. I personally love having the sensors on the exterior doors and having the panel notify me when the kids go in and out, or open bedroom windows and what not. The kids set the alarm off by accident a few times, and had great response time from both the Cove representatives and the police. Great customer service!!! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system and company!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome alarm system. Built in cellular and battery back up. I have one for my home, office and RV. This is replacing an Alarm.com system on my office that cost around $3,000 and over $600 a year service fee. The system is very easy to set up and the customer service at Cove is 2and to none.
customer_reviews.author: Gutter Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love our Cove. Love our peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: Love our Cove Security system! Easily the best choice for our home and peace of mind! Cove support is super helpful and answered all of our questions! Affordable choice for equipment and none of those prison contracts like those handed out by the bros in orange. We love our Cove!!
customer_reviews.author: HailTopher

customer_reviews.title: Good quality user friendly security system.
customer_reviews.text: This alarm system is very easy to setup and use. There’s no 24/7 tech support. Live security monitoring is available 24/7. I like the cellular connection to the security monitoring center. No need for wi-fi or a land phone line.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: Awesomely easy setup. Quality construction. Great customer service. I really like this system. After using for a couple months, this is the best system I've ever owned. Called customer service a couple times and they are a breath of fresh air. Nice and knowledgeable about the product. Peace of mind!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott925

customer_reviews.title: Wireless security
customer_reviews.text: Very easy product to set up, add too and use. Speak well when trying to use with amazon Alexa or it won’t work. Great customer service that rivals others. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Impressive DIY Security
customer_reviews.text: All personal we very knowledgeable in every way! From start to finish I can express how helpful they were from the very start and to the accounting part.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Awe

customer_reviews.title: I sent it back.
customer_reviews.text: Was not easy to install. Kept getting an error message. Called Tech Support 3 times and they could not help me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan A. Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic panel. Has no real features other then arm/disarm. App never works and again has no useful features other then arm/disarm. Doesn’t support cameras. You get a text message and email on alarms, so make sure you watch your phone or you’ll miss the alert. Customer support/tech support is horrible. There’s much better systems out there.
customer_reviews.author: cbear6

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Added this system to a newly purchased 1921 house and the ease of installation is amazing. It only takes about 15 minutes to install the whole system, no tools needed, and the tech support people are great when you call them. Each piece is exactly what I expected and great quality equipment. I would highly recommend cove security.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cove Let’s Me Sleep Easy
customer_reviews.text: I received my Cove system a week ago and I am 100% pleased. I needed 24 sensors and the base unit talked me through every step of the install. I like how easy it was to customize the name of each sensor. With 8 windows just in the livin room, it’s nice to know that “Living Room Window 6” is open. Makes it so easy to arm. Only issue was a dead remote. I called and they quickly sent out a working one by Fed Ex. I plan to add Co2 and smoke detector soon.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package I was impressed with the quality of the hardware. The installation was easy and straightforward. As far as I can tell the range is superb, I placed a flood sensor in the basement and the touch screen panel had no issues picking it up. I enjoy being able to hear when doors are opened when the system is not armed. The key fobs are super convenient and it’s an easy to use system. I would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Emiley Morgan

customer_reviews.title: A wise choice 😉
customer_reviews.text: The best thing since sliced bread. EZ set up, great support staff. Can't beat the price & discounts they offer. A wise investment for a time like this.Peace and Blessings 🙏
customer_reviews.author: lottydotty

customer_reviews.title: The BEST home security system in 2020
customer_reviews.text: Overall the best security system I’ve ever had. We’ve had ADT, Vivint and SimpliSafe but the cove has beat all of those. Honestly, I wouldn’t recommend any other alarm than Cove. Great customer experience, fast dispatch and big responsive touchscreen
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great, Affordable Home Security
customer_reviews.text: We’ve loved our Cove system so far! Tech support was responsive and very helpful with the questions we had during initial setup. They had to reset our login so it would work on the app but after that, the app has worked great!
customer_reviews.author: MTL

customer_reviews.title: Great service, good price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the service! Easy set up, works well and, reasonably priced .100% cellular, self monitored 14.99or professional monitoring service 24.99 a month!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Irons-Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good and Simple
customer_reviews.text: Simple package, simple instructions, simple install, and simple technical support. And the price is definitely right for the peace of mind (and hopefully some money off the home insurance!).
customer_reviews.author: brad
